msg.msgText: Destination mapping rule {0}. Queue manager connection {1}. Unable to connect to WebSphere MQ queue manager {2}. MQCONNX Reason {3}.

msgExplanation.p: A failure occurred while attempting to connect to a WebSphere MQ queue manager.

msgUserResponse.p: Use the reason code shown in the message to determine the cause of the failure and take appropriate action to rectify the problem.
